channel.title: [again & again .. ] faq : how can i make a owner crown!
channel.description:
Hi moparscape's user :)
So i ask again this question ... I have player right 3 : Co owner and owner ..
i would like to add a custom crown ,like silver for mod and gold for admin !
But nobody never answer , they only said something not interesting.
Can you help me ? Thanks :)

item.title: [again & again .. ] faq : how can i make a owner crown!
item.dc:creator: @Echo3 Echo_
item.description:
@Echo3 wrote:

Find “mod icons” in the cache by using Tom’ s Cache Suite, then overwrite the current crowns with the ones you want. Then repack the cache.

Read full topic
item.source: [again & again .. ] faq : how can i make a owner crown!

item.title: [again & again .. ] faq : how can i make a owner crown!
item.dc:creator: @xhunterzx xhunterzx
item.description:
@xhunterzx wrote:

rotfl, briice get your custom crown image and make sure its the same size, and then go replace the crown images in client side.

Read full topic
item.source: [again & again .. ] faq : how can i make a owner crown!

item.title: [again & again .. ] faq : how can i make a owner crown!
item.dc:creator: @mangalover51 mangalover51
item.description:
@mangalover51 wrote:

replace the file in your client that has the pictures and put the new custom crown picture in there make sure the file sizes are the same as the old crowns tho.

Read full topic
item.source: [again & again .. ] faq : how can i make a owner crown!
